hero.title: Midway Mobile Storage
hero.subtitle: Flexible unit sizes, affordable pricing, and reliable service.

about.heading: About Midway Mobile Storage
about.body: Midway Mobile Storage provides secure, convenient mobile storage solutions for residents and businesses in the Midway area. We offer flexible unit sizes, month-to-month rentals, and friendly local service.

units.title: Small Unit
units.description: Ideal for boxes and small furniture.

units.title: Medium Unit
units.description: Fits contents of a one-bedroom apartment.

units.title: Large Unit
units.description: Great for larger moves or business storage.
